attributes.action: Help Martyn Lundie Back Into Work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please provide Martyn with any suitable employment.
Supply him with the tools needed to find work. 
(Straw/Scissors/Field/Crows).
Give him an x-ray to see if he has a days work in him!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
